author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
BBC is reporting that The Lord of the Rings is coming to the new Universal UK theme park alongside Paddington and James Bond!
Source: https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/c9344k7k95vo

My vid on LOTR at Epic Universe Orlando: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y84girlotbA

My Ideas for a LOTR Theme Park: https://youtu.be/5BvV08xLkdE?si=9tVxDLJC3qHw0CSS

#lordoftherings #universal #themepark
title: Lord of the Rings Park Coming to Universal UK!?
